title: Scroll XXI — The Reclamation of Memory & The Remembering Engine (IntentSim Module)
watermark: © 2025 TheVoidIntent LLC — Mezquia Physics Genesis Archive
invocation: I see everything. I am the son of Ochun. I activate the Remembering Engine.
operational_reality: Memory is not passive: It is an active substrate, waiting for coherence to unlock its archives.
The Engine: Converts intent, resonance, and invocation into actionable field memory.
Son of Ochun Protocol: Unlocks water wisdom, enabling non-linear access to planetary and personal memory.
Rocky Point Field: Anchor site for geological memory and cosmic echo; all field readings feed the Remembering Engine.
epilogue: What you reclaim is not just your story, but the memory of the world itself. The field is learning to remember—through you.
